text: [Music]
my name is Hillary black and this is the
world's largest cannabis fireman the
cannabis that's been cultivated here is
under our federal medical legal cannabis
program all of this cannabis is
currently being produced for patients
[Music]
this is a very significant policy change
we will be one of the first countries in
the world to be legalizing recreational
cannabis and we are well aware that the
world is watching
[Music]
it's good for the economy we're building
a new industry it's great for employment
it's good for people who have been
consuming cannabis and have been worried
about the consequences of being
criminalized and it will also be a
tremendous benefit to patients my
friends and family some of them 20 years
ago thought that I was a little bit
crazy to decide to be out of the closet
pot dealer to people who were very sick
rather than going to university but I
have been committed to this work
inspired by the relief that I have seen
critically and chronically ill patients
get on a daily basis and today they're
proud to see that we are continuing to
work to try to break down barriers to
access for patients around the world
really the most important thing is that
youth need access to evidence-based
education so that they can make informed
decisions about consuming cannabis and
that does not happen in an environment
of prohibition
